strat

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MDStrategy, MDStrategyArray, MDStrategyIV

    public interface Strategy
    Interface for classes to store strategies (for MDPs, games, etc.)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Strategy.Choice 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear storage of the strategy.
      void exportActions(PrismLog out)
      Export the strategy to a PrismLog, displaying strategy choices as action names.
      void exportDotFile(PrismLog out)
      Export the strategy to a dot file (of the model showing the strategy).
      void exportIndices(PrismLog out)
      Export the strategy to a PrismLog, displaying strategy choices as indices.
      void exportInducedModel(PrismLog out)
      Export the model induced by this strategy to a PrismLog.
      java.lang.Object getChoiceAction()
      Get the action chosen by the strategy in the current state (assuming it is deterministic).
      void initialise(int s)
      Initialise the strategy, based on an initial model state.
      void update(java.lang.Object action, int s)
      Update the strategy, based on the next step in a model's history.

    • Method Detail

      • exportActions

        void exportActions(PrismLog out)
        Export the strategy to a PrismLog, displaying strategy choices as action names.

      • exportIndices

        void exportIndices(PrismLog out)
        Export the strategy to a PrismLog, displaying strategy choices as indices.

      • exportInducedModel

        void exportInducedModel(PrismLog out)
        Export the model induced by this strategy to a PrismLog.

      • exportDotFile

        void exportDotFile(PrismLog out)
        Export the strategy to a dot file (of the model showing the strategy).

      • initialise

        void initialise(int s)
        Initialise the strategy, based on an initial model state.
        Parameters:
        s - Initial state of the model

      • update

        void update(java.lang.Object action,
            int s)
        Update the strategy, based on the next step in a model's history.
        Parameters:
        action - The action taken in the previous state of the model
        s - The new state of the model

      • getChoiceAction

        java.lang.Object getChoiceAction()
        Get the action chosen by the strategy in the current state (assuming it is deterministic).

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear storage of the strategy.
